title: I'd Rather Be Riding My Bike
description: Evolved Publishing presents "I'd Rather Be Riding My Bike" by Eric Pinder. This playful story by the author of "Cat in the Clouds" and "If All the Animals Came Inside" is perfect for children aged 3-6. ...The sun is still out. I'm stuck here inside. When will I ever get outside to ride?.... After a long school day and chores at home, one boy's patience is rewarded when he finally gets to go riding his bike with a friend. Whimsical artwork combines with funny rhymes to create a rollicking ride for young readers and cyclists. Features full color illustrations by John Cardinal, and an endnote with a short history of bicycles.
author: Eric Pinder
